alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 5:41AM CDT until May 08 at 1:24AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Emporia affecting Lyon County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River Near Neosho Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River Near Neosho Rapids. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Low lying areas along the river flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 4.1 feet early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/top/.
